headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https://img.youtube.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.rss2json.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://w.soundcloud.com https://open.spotify.com; worker-src 'self' blob:;
